==Trivia==
* This soundtrack features the Electro Archon theme which was also used in other soundtracks. The other tracks are: [[Awake From a Nightmare]], [[Dream of Homeland]], [[In the Strange Realm of Sakura]], [[Interwoven Nostalgia]], [[Island for Outlanders]], [[Preparation of Matsuri]], [[Separated Dream]], [[Termination of Desires]], and [[The Sealed Harbor]].
